## Data Manipulation with COVID-19 

This is a data set that has been curated buy Ramin Krispin and Jerret Byrnes and 
automatically updates daily. The package has been uploaded to the CRAN repository

```{r}
install.packages("coronavirus")
coronavirus
library(coronavirus)
library(tidyverse)

head(coronavirus)
coronavirus %>%
  filter(country == "US")
head(covid19_vaccine)
covid19_vaccine %>%
  filter(country_region == "US")
```
